channel.title: I need help woth creating a server a prize is in the deal!
channel.description: well ok listen i have the source that i want and everything i just need someones help creating it because forsome reason i cant port forward so if u make the server for me but ill have to send u the source ill make u owner and ill give u a lvl 73 account it has nothing on it because it has gotten hacked. well if u are intrested then message me at [i][u]hunterbass76@hotmail.com [/u] [/i] if u are the one that has to host it i really need you to have it on most of the day and night thx.

item.title: I need help woth creating a server a prize is in the deal!
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“peanut837, post:3, topic:258107”][quote author=weeds link=topic=340776.msg2661308#msg2661308 date=1234215353]
i suggest in stead of port forwarding use utorret i couldn’t port forward and i just used utorret all you do is
download it go to files prefrences change the port to 43594 tmake sure the box random port each time in “UN TICKED” then click apply then go to run your server if it say port already in use the go to utorret same part where you change port click random port and apply then when you done that run server it runs fine go to u torret change numbers back to 43594 apply then walla also you need no-ip. duc to get the server ip and make sure that your server ip is ticked with a smile face next to it and i hope this helped you =)
[/quote] thats what i do :)[/quote]
u serius?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help woth creating a server a prize is in the deal!
item.dc:creator: @weeds weeds
item.description:
@weeds wrote:

i suggest in stead of port forwarding use utorret i couldn’t port forward and i just used utorret all you do is
download it go to files prefrences change the port to 43594 tmake sure the box random port each time in “UN TICKED” then click apply then go to run your server if it say port already in use the go to utorret same part where you change port click random port and apply then when you done that run server it runs fine go to u torret change numbers back to 43594 apply then walla also you need no-ip. duc to get the server ip and make sure that your server ip is ticked with a smile face next to it and i hope this helped you =)
